name: ArtFight Jam!
description:
Made for My First GameJam - Summer 2020
& ArtFight 2020 - Sugar vs Spice

Walk around in a small garden park populated by other people's characters!

A bit of Context:

Hi, i'm Spotty! This year for ArtFight I thought i'd do something special for an attack, and since my two favorite events of the year were happening at the same time I figured why not mash the two together!

Due to collabs not being allowed on ArtFight, i've created everything on my own (expect for the music/ambience). All the character's models, animations,  and textures, as well as the environment and programming were all done by me!

Though My First Game Jam will be over, ArtFight continues on into August so I plan on developing and adding even more characters in until then! Keep a watch out for updates~

Credits

Programming, Models, Textures, Voices and Design - Spottedphyre
